page.title: 15HOME LIFE - IDEN GREEN CONT.
page.content: Down the lane live father and two teenage sons. Their accommodation is a tied semi-detached house. Dad works for local Farmer,they do not own a car but all three have{bicycles.}Family life is village based. The boys have for several years shopped at the local shop for groceries, they both have a paper round and when not at the local {Comprehensive School}spend their time {fishing,}watching television,swimming, playing{football}and other games on the Green with children of like age. Their neighbour is widowed and lives in one of the nearby{Almshouses. She has no relatives in the Village but knows many villagers and is friendly with several. She enjoys gardening and visits from family. Bus services to nearby towns have made it easier for her to shop and bank.
